body:
People wonder why "ugly bastard" tags are a thing, it's really just similar how incest, ntr, exhibitionism, bestiality, corruption and those other degen tags are popular, even lolis. It's satisfies a fantasy that isn't in the norm.. the forbidden, taboo, and the unlikely.

Normally, a hot girl won't be fucking ugly shitstains like this guy unless they're gold diggers and he's loaded with money or unless she was forced. But through art, the limits is basically the imagination, think of these things as fantasy fulfillment.

But most important of all, don't get too fucking invested in drawings. We're here to fap, not to discuss the morality of man.
I'm not gay but can't be a hot dilf instead of this old fat dude? Like what's this artists deal with fat abominable almost grotesque dudes... Like WTF, why can't they be normal.
Fucking fat cunts fucked me in the eyes too many times that i’ve predicted this to have shitty fucking dilf tag in it.
So, a poriuretan wannabe? Am I the only one that would like to see more original art and writing styles? Well whatever...
